title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1002.4 - Required payment date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1002.4 - Required payment date

State Regulations
(a) Effective through June 30, 1989, the required payment date shall be 45 calendar
days after the ROI date. (b) Effective July 1, 1989, the required payment date shall be 30 calendar days, excluding legal holidays, after the ROI date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1002.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
